scripts.preinstall: cd ../hrm-form-definitions && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.dev: cross-env UNBUNDLED_REACT=true NO_MONITORING=true REACT_APP_FORM_DEFINITIONS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8090 run-p dev:local-form-definition-server start
scripts.dev:local:e2e: npm run ssm:local:appConfig:e2e && cross-env REACT_APP_SERVERLESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3030 REACT_APP_HRM_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080 npm run dev
scripts.dev:local:e2e:docker: npm run ssm:local:appConfig:e2e && cross-env REACT_APP_SERVERLESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3030 REACT_APP_HRM_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8081 npm run dev
scripts.lint: eslint --ignore-pattern src/private --ext js --ext jsx --ext ts --ext tsx src/
scripts.env:local:microservice-url: docker run --rm --net=host -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1 -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=fake -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=fake interrobangc/awscli2 ssm get-parameter --name '/local/hrm/microservice/api-url' --endpoint-url http://localhost:4566  --region us-east-1 --query 'Parameter.Value' --output text | awk '{print "REACT_APP_HRM_MICROSERVICE_BASE_URL=" $0}' >> .env.local
scripts.ssm:local: npm run ssm:local:appConfig && npm run ssm:local:secret
scripts.ssm:local:appConfig: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws:/home/aws/.aws -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY interrobangc/awscli2 ssm get-parameter --name "/local/flex-plugins/plugin-hrm-form/appConfig.js" --with-decryption --query "Parameter.Value" --output text > ./public/appConfig.js
scripts.ssm:local:appConfig:e2e: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws:/home/aws/.aws -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY interrobangc/awscli2 ssm get-parameter --name "/local/flex-plugins/plugin-hrm-form/e2e-test/appConfig.js" --with-decryption --query "Parameter.Value" --output text > ./public/appConfig.js
scripts.ssm:local:secret: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws:/home/aws/.aws -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY interrobangc/awscli2 ssm get-parameter --name "/local/flex-plugins/plugin-hrm-form/secret.js" --with-decryption --query "Parameter.Value" --output text > ./src/private/secret.js
